title: The Future is Embedded Finance
comment: Source: TLDR Newsletter, Date: 2025-12-18, Reading time: 8 minute read, Links: https://tracking.tldrnewsletter.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Flinks.tldrnewsletter.com%2FHOXXVi/1/0100019b31d332a1-7d121465-eacf-469b-aecf-45cdf73e1086-000000/n1bXrLWN1nmfopHU22H_o6-_zl_3MyRH5Zz34zfr8Pc=436
summary: The Future is Embedded Finance (8 minute read) Embedded finance simplifies financial services, provides products and services closer to the point of need, and can ensure banks keep competitive challengers at bay. In the past, customers would have to physically go to a bank for a product, whereas now, with this integrated model, the product comes directly to them through the platforms they already use and online sites they visit.

title: Yes, AGI Can Happen – A Computational Perspective
comment: Source: TLDR Newsletter, Date: 2025-12-18, Reading time: 5 minute read, Links: https://tracking.tldrnewsletter.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Fdanfu.org%2Fnotes%2Fagi%2F%3Futm_source=tldrai/1/0100019b31ee4fa8-3c3c5e31-d738-495c-9b42-3acbf8e8a864-000000/9nib9TixWQXMuYFA3KdErKy-0PmUxmpdCQB1-zKZh6U=436
summary: Yes, AGI Can Happen – A Computational Perspective (5 minute read) Current models vastly underutilize hardware: DeepSeek-V3 and Llama-4 achieve only ~20% FLOP utilization during training, and inference runs at single-digit utilization because autoregressive models are bottlenecked on loading weights from memory, not compute. Models we see today are also lagging indicators, trained on last-gen hardware that's unoptimized for the massive size of modern clusters and the latest training methods.

title: TikTok signs agreement to create new US joint venture, memo says
comment: Source: TLDR Newsletter, Date: 2025-12-19, Reading time: 3 minute read, Links: https://tracking.tldrnewsletter.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Fwww.cnbc.com%2F2025%2F12%2F18%2Ftik-tok-us-sale-china.html%3Futm_source=tldrnewsletter/1/0100019b36592e93-50a329fd-4136-477f-bf3a-d601be18869b-000000/Y5wctPowiT4bQtQgYxsScl2Bxdi3kh7VfiPv2guF_eU=436
summary: TikTok signs agreement to create new US joint venture, memo says (3 minute read) TikTok's US operations will soon be housed in a new joint venture named TikTok USDS Joint Venture LLC. The company has signed agreements with Oracle, Silver Lake, and Abu Dhabi-based MGX. The deal's closing date is on January 22. Oracle will serve as the 'trusted security partner' in charge of auditing and validating that TikTok complies with agreed-upon national security terms.
